title: Provenance
description: The details of a file's origin

source.description: The person or organisation who provided the information

method.description: The method by which the information was published or released

requester.description: If the information was released under the OIA, the person who requested it

published.description: The date on which the file was published

released.description: The date on which the file was released

retrieved.description: If the file was retrieved or released after its initial publication, the date on which it was retrieved

url.description: The URL of the page where the file was retrieved from

fileUrl.description: The URL of the file where it was originally retrieved from
